Website: http://www.paulaapsell.com/
Address: 3574 Hanifan Lane, Boston, MA 02108
Phone: 678-523-1251

In 2018, Paula Apsell received the Lifetime Achievement Award for the work she has done as the Senior Executive Producer and driving force of NOVA, a primetime science series produced by WGBH in Boston. Paula Apsell had a love for science from a young age and has transferred that passion to the small screen first as a production assistant and progressing to a leadership role.
